name: Single-leg Hip Thrust
setup: Sit with upper back against bench, feet flat on floor
Lift one foot off ground, keep knee bent
Working leg foot positioned for optimal hip extension
steps: Drive through heel of working leg to thrust hips up
Squeeze glute of working leg hard at top
Create straight line from knee to shoulder
Lower hips with control to starting position
cues: One leg drives, other leg relaxed
mistakes: Allowing hips to tilt or rotate
safety: Start with bodyweight before adding load. Ensure good control before progressing.

prescriptionHints.load: Bodyweight to start, add weight as appropriate

joints.notes: Requires good hip stability. Keep hips level throughout movement.
